relation: If you ever see a shooting star in Animal Crossing: Wild World, press the A button and you will clap your hands together and make a wish. The next day, you will receive a letter and a gift from Wishy the Star. My first letter is show above. When I saw who it was addressed to, I immediately thought, "How do they know I like EarthBound?!" Haha, and then I came back to reality. ;)
A poem written from Lucas's perspective. Chapter 1 spoilers!
The Ghost of Starman. In my world, ALL ghosts carry lanterns. :B Acrylics and glitter.
A story about how the sesame seeds met and what drove them apart.
Annoying Old Party Duck was thrown out of Brick Road's Christmas party for spiking the eggnog and getting fresh with a Worthless Protoplasm.
